sense.gloss: large-hearted, generous, liberal, open-handed, magnanimous, easygoing
to have a talented child despite being untalented, a black hen lays a white egg, a kite gives birth to a hawk

r_ele.r: のうあるたかはつめをかくす

sense.gloss: a wise man keeps some of his talents in reserve, one shouldn't show off, the person who knows most often says least, a skilled hawk hides its talons
nightjar (any bird of family Caprimulgidae), goatsucker
soba vendors who walk around at night, soba sold by these vendors

sdata.j: ↑鵜↑↓う↓の↑目↑↓め↓↑鷹↑↓たか↓の↑目↑↓め↓で↑探↑↓さが↓していたよ。
sdata.e: He was looking for it like a hunting dog.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑本↑↓ほん↓の↑矢↑↓や↓が↑鷹↑↓たか↓を↑貫通↑↓つらぬきとお↓した。
sdata.e: An arrow passed through the hawk.

sdata.j: ↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑鋭↑↓するど↓い↑目↑↓め↓を↑持↑↓も↓っている。
↑鳶↑↓とんび↓が↑鷹↑↓たか↓を↑生↑↓う↓む。
↑何故↑↓なぜ↓か↑鷹派↑↓たかは↓と↑目↑↓もく↓される↑人↑↓ひと↓たちが、ことごとく↑苦手↑↓にがて↓。
sdata.e: For some reason, I don't cope well with those recognized as hardliners.

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: A smart falcon hides its talons.

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: He who knows the most often says the least.

words.gloss: large-hearted, generous, liberal, open-handed, magnanimous, easygoing
